posts.post_content:
The problem with this guy is this: he sort of has to be a modular card.  
  
I understand just how cool the combos with this guy can be yes. But, if you never draw him, then just what do you do with all that extra land playing power?  
  
Logically, what you ought do is have more moonfolk. But there is just one problem there: Moonfolk aren't that good as a general rule.  [Floodbringer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name= Floodbringer), [Moonbow Illusionist](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Moonbow Illusionist), [Oboro Breezecaller](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Oboro Breezecaller), [Oboro Envoy](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Oboro Envoy), and the rest of the [Soratami](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Soratami) are about your only options.  
  
There's ([Ovenomancer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ovenomancer)) and [Uyo, Silent Prophet](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Uyo, Silent Prophet) but, still.  
  
So, either risk not drawing him and having a bunch of usles land play cards on the field, or worse, fill your deck up with sub par cards. (A pitty, the soratami were so cool too)  
  
But, even without the combo, he's still a decent card. And perhaps there is a chance that someone could put together a ... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)

The problem with this guy is this: he sort of has to be a modular card.

I understand just how cool the combos with this guy can be yes. But, if you never draw him, then just what do you do with all that extra land playing power?

Logically, what you ought do is have more moonfolk. But there is just one problem there: Moonfolk aren't that good as a general rule. Floodbringer, Moonbow Illusionist, Oboro Breezecaller, Oboro Envoy, and the rest of the Soratami are about your only options.

There's (Ovenomancer) and Uyo, Silent Prophet but, still.

So, either risk not drawing him and having a bunch of usles land play cards on the field, or worse, fill your deck up with sub par cards. (A pitty, the soratami were so cool too)

But, even without the combo, he's still a decent card. And perhaps there is a chance that someone could put together a ... (see all)
